title: I Need You Always
description: Dane Prescott flies all over the world for his family’s business, partying at every turn and avoiding taking the reigns of his father’s company, until tragedy strikes. He feels lost until he sees her…Marissa Lawson couldn’t wait to graduate college, going from intern to employee at the company she works for until one of her peer’s stole her ideas and job offer. Everything around her begins to unravel until a controlling kiss from a handsome stranger, leaves her breathless and seeking to transform her life. Her luck changes when she’s offered a new position to work with the boss’s son; her stranger!Marissa wants to focus on her career, but Dane wants to dominate her; mixing business with pleasure. Every touch tempts her to submit to his desires. Can she hold up to the control he craves in life, especially in love? Can she let go of her own hang-ups and submit to him? Only time will tell if she can be everything he Needs!
author: Cynthia P. O'Neill
